short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture and store various types of data with a clean, modern interface

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X-Brain Data Capture is a powerful and user-friendly browser extension designed to streamline your digital information gathering process. This versatile tool allows users to quickly capture, store, and manage various types of data directly from their web browser.

Key Features:
Screenshot Capture: Instantly capture and save screenshots of your current browser tab with a single click.

Webpage Address Saving: Quickly save the URL of the current webpage you're visiting for easy reference later.

Clipboard Content Capture: Effortlessly save both text and images from your clipboard, making it easy to collect and organize information from various sources.

Organized Data Display: All captured data is neatly organized and displayed within the extension, categorized by type (Screenshot, Webpage Address, Clipboard Text, Clipboard Image) for easy navigation.

Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy any saved data back to your clipboard for quick sharing or use in other applications.

Data Management: Remove unwanted entries with a simple click, helping you keep your captured data organized and relevant.

Visual Categorization: Each type of data is color-coded for quick visual identification - light blue for screenshots, light grey for webpage addresses, and light green for clipboard content.

Timestamp Feature: Every piece of captured data is automatically timestamped, allowing you to track when information was collected.

X-Brain Data Capture is perfect for researchers, students, professionals, and anyone who needs to gather and organize digital information efficiently. Whether you're conducting online research, collecting inspiration for a project, or simply want to keep track of interesting web content, X-Brain Data Capture simplifies the process of collecting and managing digital information.

Boost your productivity and streamline your information gathering process with X-Brain Data Capture - your personal digital data assistant!
